title: After Champselect Game crashes at loading screen PLEASE HELP RIOT!!!!!

embed.description: Unlimited space to host images, easy to use image uploader, albums, photo hosting, sharing, dynamic image resizing on web and mobile.

body: I have just done the windows 10 update and also the LoL patch 6.15 and every time i enter champ select everything is fine. It is when it opens the client to load the game is when ill get a bugsplat error and not be able to play the game. Can anyone please help me troubleshoot this problem. I have already repaired LoL and have also uninstalled and reinstalled the game. I have also checked to make sure my Nvidia drivers are updated and they are. as well have done ALL the things riot recommends to do for connection issues like this and my connection is perfectly fine.

replies.body:
I've been seeing a lot of these lately, and I'd recommend [rolling back those updates](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) to see if anything changes.

If you still see those updates while on an older build of windows 10, please let me know.

ok so i did the rollback got in to a custom game and it seemed to work fine besides the fact that my LoL screen was very small and i couldnt maximize the size of it. i tryed to restore to defualt the video settings and it made the game all screwy so i closed LoL out and tryed to reopen it to fix my resolution issues now its giving me the same bugsplat as before

That's certainly strange behaviour after rolling back those updates. Since you're still having issues, I recommend reaching out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach them to your ticket, you'll provide a ton of context for our techs to use to resolve this.
